General.Name: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co Ltd ADR
General.Description: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd. provides technology solutions in Taiwan. The company offers consumer electronics comprising of television sets, game consoles, set-top boxes, and audio systems. It also provides cloud and networking products consisting of routers, servers, edge computing, data centers and satellite communications. In addition, the company offers desktop computers, laptops, tablets, multi-function devices and printers for office use. Further, it provides connectors and optical and electronic components, semiconductor products, automotive equipment, and related services. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.2, Zihyou Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236
